game_description: Welcome to our world!Here, you will embark on an interesting journey of exploration!Enjoy it! This game is special in gesture recognition attacks.You can use knives, guns, swords and fireballs against enemies.You can also pick up new planetary weapons by hand.When you're good at it, you will have fun!
review_1: As you roam the universe, you can also use gesture weapons to attack monsters in the universe.You can pick up planets to use as your weapon.It's fun when you get good at it.
